about_the_game:
Sol Mates is a chaotic co-op adventure where up to 4 players can dive into quick, action-packed missions together, either locally or online. With procedurally generated challenges and narrative twists, teamwork is essential as you steer, shield, and blast through space hazards like pirates and black holes. As a united crew, you’ll make strategic choices under pressure—one wrong move could land you face-to-face with a giant alien crab!

With Great Chaos, Comes Great Responsibility

Between loading guns, charging batteries, putting out fires and more, everyone’s gonna have to pull their own weight for your ship to stay in one piece and to complete your missions.

Friendships are built on trust...AND CHAOS!

Couch Co-Op is the genre of our childhoods! Well - for those of you who grew up in the 90's  We wanted to make a game for you to invite your friends to come over and navigate the perils of space together. With plenty of stations to load, operate, and steer you'll need to work together to progress through your campaign. Play local and online multiplayer or if you're really feeling brave take on missions solo - though we highly recommend calling up your friends for extra support. 

Decisions Decisions Decisions…

A giant crab is prying open a space pod of a little octopus - do you catch the octopus or take on the crab?! Vote on a blend of random events featuring a unique mix of narrative & strategic decisions. Which direction will you take the story next? And hey, if all else fails - try out a new path during your next playthrough!

Unlock, Upgrade, Unleash! 

Ray Guns, Incendiary Shields, and Vortex Ammo - oh my! Play through each campaign to unlock new missions, new gear and new bragging rights. Each unlock and difficulty modifier brings new combinations to the table, providing endless replayability.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030 / AMD RX 550, 4 GBVRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Steer, shield, and blast your way through space in this chaotic co-op party game. You and your ragtag crew will take on missions, make quick decisions, and work together to make a name for yourself in the vast expanse of the universe.
